scores.question: How to check the point system?

points.item: Click the other tab in the bottom navigation bar.
Select the Cricket or Football system which you have to check.

scores.question: How to check player points breakup?

points.item: Select the match and click the full score in the bottom navigation bar.
Click the full squad in the tabs and click on the player names to know about the player points breakup.

scores.question: How to check match full score?

points.item: Select the match and click the full score in the bottom navigation bar.
Click on the team names to check the scoreboard.
